title: Not A Brexit Burden (with Claire Coutinho MP)
itunes:title: Not A Brexit Burden (with Claire Coutinho MP)
description:
The shortages of fuel and emptying supermarket shelves are not down to Brexit, Claire Coutinho, Conservative MP for Surrey East and parliamentary private secretary at the Treasury tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing.

Coutinho says higher wages will be part of the economic readjustment after the pandemic and this will be widely welcomed.

Henry Hill, news editor at the website Conservative Home, joins to discuss the dilemma facing the party over keeping Red Wall voters and traditional Conservatives happy at the same time.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
